data.lyric:
[ti:Lover (Remix)]
[ar:Taylor Swift/Shawn Mendes]
[al:Lover (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lover (Remix) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)/Shawn Mendes (肖恩·蒙德兹)
[00:04.92]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Shawn Mendes/Scott Harris
[00:09.85]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Shawn Mendes/Scott Harris
[00:14.78]Taylor Swift：
[00:15.22]We can leave the Christmas lights up 'til January
[00:22.19]This is our place we make the rules
[00:28.07]And there's a dazzling haze
[00:30.05]A mysterious way about you dear
[00:36.00]Have I known you 20 seconds or 20 years
[00:42.28]Can I go where you go
[00:49.10]Can we always be this close
[00:54.33]Forever and ever
[00:56.10]And ah take me out
[00:58.88]And take me home
[01:03.19]You're my my my my
[01:09.47]Lover
[01:15.31]Shawn Mendes：
[01:17.82]We could light a bunch of candles and dance around the kitchen baby
[01:24.25]Pictures of when we were young would hang on the wall
[01:30.95]We'll sit on the stoop
[01:32.53]I'll sing love songs to you when we're eighty
[01:37.64]See I finally got you now
[01:40.17]Honey I won't let you fall
[01:44.06]Both：
[01:45.20]Can I go where you go
[01:51.90]Can we always be this close
[01:57.40]Forever and ever
[01:59.06]And ah take me out
[02:01.82]And take me home
[02:04.39]Forever and ever
[02:06.14]You're my my my my
[02:11.60]Shawn Mendes：
[02:12.47]Lover
[02:13.28]Taylor Swift：
[02:13.65]Ladies and gentlemen will you please stand
[02:16.76]With every guitar string scar on my hand
[02:20.27]I take this magnetic force of a man
[02:23.30]To be my lover
[02:26.79]Shawn Mendes：
[02:27.32]Look in my eyes they will tell you the truth
[02:30.62]The girl in my story has always been you
[02:34.30]I'd go down with the Titanic it's true for you
[02:38.91]Both：
[02:39.57]Lover
[02:41.03]And you'll save all your dirtiest jokes for me
[02:47.41]And at every table I'll save you a seat
[02:52.76]Save you a seat
[02:53.66]Lover
[02:55.19]Can I go where you go
[02:58.88]Can I go where you go baby
[03:02.08]Can we always be this close
[03:07.37]Forever and ever
[03:09.11]And ah take me out
[03:11.78]And take me home
[03:14.57]Forever and ever
[03:16.18]You're my my my my
[03:22.42]Oh you're my my my my
[03:29.50]Darling you're my my my my
[03:36.46]Lover
data.trans:
[ti:Lover (Remix)]
[ar:Taylor Swift/Shawn Mendes]
[al:Lover (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.92]//
[00:09.85]//
[00:14.78]//
[00:15.22]就让圣诞节的彩灯亮到明年一月吧
[00:22.19]这是我们的地盘 我们说了算
[00:28.07]似乎你的世界充斥着
[00:30.05]令人困惑的神秘迷雾
[00:36.00]我究竟与你是短暂相识还是认识多年？
[00:42.28]我能否不离不弃随你天涯海角？
[00:49.10]我们能否永远这般亲密无间？
[00:54.33]永永远远
[00:56.10]啊 带我离开吧
[00:58.88]带我回到我向往已久的家吧
[01:03.19]你就是我的 我的
[01:09.47]专属爱人
[01:15.31]//
[01:17.82]点燃蜡烛 我们在餐厅跳舞
[01:24.25]年轻时的照片在墙上挂着
[01:30.95]80岁的我们 坐在凳子上
[01:32.53]我对你轻轻唱着一首首情歌
[01:37.64]最终我还是得以伴你终老
[01:40.17]亲爱的 我不会让你受伤
[01:44.06]//
[01:45.20]我能否不离不弃随你天涯海角？
[01:51.90]我们能否永远这般亲密无间？
[01:57.40]永永远远
[01:59.06]啊 带我离开吧
[02:01.82]带我回到我向往已久的家吧
[02:04.39]永永远远
[02:06.14]你就是我的 我的
[02:11.60]//
[02:12.47]专属爱人
[02:13.28]//
[02:13.65]先生们 女士们 你们能否
[02:16.76]与我手上的吉他弦伤一起为我做个见证
[02:20.27]我将会与这位魅力十足的男人
[02:23.30]携手到老
[02:26.79]//
[02:27.32]看着我的眼睛 它们会告诉你
[02:30.62]你是我生命中的唯一
[02:34.30]我愿为你随泰坦尼克沉没
[02:38.91]//
[02:39.57]爱人
[02:41.03]你的那些烂笑话就只对我讲好了
[02:47.41]每次吃饭 我的身边都会预留你的位置
[02:52.76]你的位置
[02:53.66]爱人
[02:55.19]我能否不离不弃随你天涯海角？
[02:58.88]我能否不离不弃随你天涯海角？
[03:02.08]我们能否永远这般亲密无间？
[03:07.37]永永远远
[03:09.11]啊 带我离开吧
[03:11.78]带我回到我向往已久的家吧
[03:14.57]永永远远
[03:16.18]你就是我的 我的
[03:22.42]你就是我的 我的
[03:29.50]你就是我的 我的
[03:36.46]爱人
